casebody.data:
Wednesday, January 16, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

97-551. Ross v. Farmers Ins. Group of Cos.

Montgomery App. No. 15865. This cause is pending before the court on the certification of conflict by the Court of Appeals for Montgomery County. Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae, Ohio Academy of Trial Lawyers, to participate in argument,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to participate in oral argument be, and hereby is, granted, and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellants.
